May 7, 1956 D Scottish Miners Gala Contest
Scottish Miners Gala Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
scottish-miners-gala-contest
None
Holyrood Park, Edinburgh
Best section 2 band - Lochgelly Public. Best section 3 band - Croy Parish. Best section 4 band - New Cumnock. Deportment - 1st Bowhill, 2nd Newtongrange Lothian. 15 bands competed.
April 10, 2013, 6:38 p.m. April 10, 2013, 6:42 p.m.
